description:
The fourth way up Mount Benson,  more coming.
Good trail to follow until you hit the ridge, trail becomes harder to pick out but look for ribbons.
This trail is in the general area of:
directions: Take Jingle Pot Road West from Nanaimo, cross Hiway 19, Left on Westwood Road to end (don't go down Arbot road).
title: Mt. Benson from Witchcraft Lake 4
